workflows.creator: 5fded9ad-cf9a-43e3-9b08-28bde8b87d6e
workflows.title: On NS Sub Activation Set SF Opportunity Subscription Status

boolean-condition-2.title: Opportunity updated?
boolean-condition-2.description: Check if the opportunity was really updated and not skipped because of an incorrect product family, or subscription plan, etc.

salesforce-5.title: Set Subscription Status: Activ
salesforce-5.description: Sets the subscription status on the synced opportunity, even if the opportunity is closed. Also sets the NetSuite ID because the synced opportunity might also be retrieved by the parent subscription ID.

label.value: Customer Activated | Auto Renewed | Finance Action

message.value: NetSuite Subscription {$.steps.trigger.data.id} is activated for the reason:'{$.steps.netsuite-1.custrecord_st_change_reason.refName or:'unknown'}'.
The subscription status change reason is not supported: '{$.steps.netsuite-1.custrecord_st_change_reason.refName}'

content.value:
Primary quote was reset on the opportunity, id={$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].Id}.
The corresponding subscription, id={$.steps.trigger.data.id}, was activated in NetSuite and the quote might be outdated

message.value: Failed to update the opportunity and put it to 'Closed-Won'.
The quote is signed, we cannot update the products.

dependencies.name: On Draft NS Renewal Subscription Created/Updated, Create/Update SF Renewal Opportunity
Create Jira ticket for a Flow Error
Subflow upload contract documents to Opportunity
